author: parithosh
content: The EL teams are mostly done with updating the default gas limit to 45M, could we have similar releases from the CL teams?

author: tersec
content: next Nimbus release will do so, waiting on one important bug fix + usual testing cycle

author: terencechain
content: Prysm pr is already out, I think we should have them in next release as well

author: pawandhananjay
content: we have a PR too for the next release

author: jtraglia
content: We just published the v1.6.0-alpha.3 release. Please note that there are new fork choice tests for Fulu which are expected to fail without the appropriate client codebase changes; there's a new `columns` parameter which replaces the `blob` & `proof` parameters. If you run into any issues, please ping me.
